title: Strengthening Teaching Methodology Practical Competencies: Design and Evaluation of Tourism e-Learning Courses: DMO Marketing Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can independently design tourism marketing strategies using an e-learning module in a smartphone environment.
Learners can analyze real DMO (Destination Management Organization) cases via a PBL (Project-Based Learning) approach and produce marketing materials for travel agencies.
Learners can provide feedback on improving the usability of an e-learning platform through formative assessments with over 80% accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
